project.title: ScaleIoT
project.content: ScaleIoT is another project from my large collection of IoT (Internet of Things) projects. In this project, I decided to make a smart scale that would record the weight of a user that stepped onto the scale and then display statistics on the users' weight over time on a web page. This project uses a raspberry pi and a webcam, along with a python-based OpenCV image processing component. I learned a lot about OpenCV and image processing through the course of this project and it is one of my most useful projects to date_range!
